content: Assuming that option #1 in Correct location for proposed hooks is correct, there are a couple of hooks there that I'd like to use, but I don't think they're sufficiently/correctly specified. For example, for discharge-view, I'd like to assert that the only contexts needed are patient id and encounter id. What's the correct way to have such a discussion? Just edit the hook? Add an alternative version of the same hook? Add discussion to the wiki page? Discuss things here? Something else?
(And it might be good to document this on whatever page the authoritative list of candidates is maintained on :))
